siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, In this episode, Stan Lemon reviews Meat Rubs by Fenker (or.. Meat, Rubbed, and Salutary - branding pending.) Stan gives a good review but the only way to get them are to be friends with Rev. Aaron Fenker. Stan got new Apple Gear, much of the world got new apple…

frontmatter.title: Episode 11 - Meat Rubs, New Apple Toys, Investing 101

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, The story of this week’s episode is that Jon had a simple question for Stan that he texted on a Sunday evening after a google search failed him. The question went something like this: “Top ten things to look at when your Realtor shows you houses… go!” I (Jon…

frontmatter.title: Episode 10 - What to look for when looking at Houses (Top 10!)

node.excerpt: We forgot to talk about this in Episode 9. Jon gives Stan a hard time for his blog post image not being mobile friendly and helps him to correct his CSS.

frontmatter.title: BONUS ROUND - Stan needs a CSS Refresher

node.excerpt: Dear Listener who may in fact be sick of hearing us talk about milkshakes, This week we talk about Milkshakes! Stan’s Portillo’s milkshake to be exact. He had an interesting experience. He tells it better than I do. But this picture is referenced… Stan's portillo's milkshake…

Dear Financially Minded Listener, Thanks for tuning in for Episode 8! This week Jon met his mortgage savings goal so he seeks advice from the most experienced guy he knows - Stan Lemon (who has gone through the process 6 times.) Stan drops some knowledge and points out some…

frontmatter.title: Episode 8 - If you don't buy milkshakes with your money, save for a house!

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, If you want to hear us talk about milkshakes for an abnormal amount of time, you won’t want to miss this episode! Stan kicks off the episode talking about his day trip to Fort Wayne and how there are now places to eat. We follow up on our milkshake discussion with…

frontmatter.title: Episode 7 - Fort Wayne, Milkshakes, and The Death of Twitter

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Thanks for tuning in again week! In Episode 6 of Life with a Twist of Lemon, Stan tells us about his trip to Atlanta for work. He has Jon salivating over some of the food he found and looking up plane tickets to head to Atlanta. All of that somehow leads into Jon’s…

Dear Faithful Listener, This week we release episode 5 of the Life with a Twist of Lemon podcast.  Stan and I recently saw Ant Man and the Wasp. So we take a look at the movie itself and its place in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. You should probably watch the movie first if you…

frontmatter.title: Episode 5 - Ant Man and the Wasp

node.excerpt: This week Stan & Jon give their opinion on the New Backstreet Boys song, talk Stan’s new Beats headphones, and his family’s trip to Disney World, hear about Stan’s favorite rides, food, and what he plans to do differently for next time.

frontmatter.title: Episode 4 - Stan's back from Disney World!

node.excerpt:
Stan switched web browsers for the day, so he and Jon kick off the episode talking about that. That leads into office type suites, to financial apps to budgeting. Listen in to a typical conversation of Stan Lemon and Jon Kohlmeier.
